ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of the HONOURABLE RICHARD JAMIESON SCOTT, O.C., O.M., of Winnipeg, Manitoba, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as a member of the Independent Advisory Board for Supreme Court of Canada Judicial Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
